thread.title: Dirty Hotel
thread.title_full: Dirty Hotel - Review of Premier Inn London Hammersmith Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Dylan F
title: Dirty Hotel
text:
Stayed for one night to go and see a show near by.
The television in the room looked like it was from the dark ages.
However, my gripe is the room was filthy. The windows looked like they haven't been cleaned in years.
The bathroom looked like something from the third world.
I find this unacceptable for a hotel chain that boasts quality.
It should not be difficult to actually clean a room
